long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension can help you track the series you watch and love with updates!

It is easy to use, with user friendly UI.
This extension provides 100% privacy and won't save any data on any servers at all.
Tested in Chrome and Edge as extension.
Can be also used in Private/Incognito Mode.
Search works for English language series only at the moment.
